definition: to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
to reveal/to display/to show/to exhibit sth
to point out/to remind (sb of sth)/to suggest/suggestion/tip/reminder/notice
to demonstrate/to show how to do sth/demonstration/a model example
to show/to take out and show to others/to display
to demonstrate (as a protest)/a demonstration/a military show of force
to write comments on a report submitted by a subordinate/written comments from a superior

sentences.english: He came to welcome me with a handshake.
sentences.chinese: 他來與我握手錶示歡迎。

sentences.english: The fibrous tissues aroud the tumor cells were positive for VG.
sentences.chinese: VG染色示腫瘤細胞周圍有纖維組織反應增生。

sentences.english: His coach Sun Haiping said he was worried about the great pressure on Liu Xiang at this time.
sentences.chinese: 教練孫海平對劉翔此次所承受的壓力錶示擔心。

sentences.english: Hello. This is the Yanhua Fenghuang Hospital. May I see your passport please.
sentences.chinese: 您好，這裏是燕化鳳凰醫院，請出示您的護照。

sentences.english: May I have your passport and arrival card, please?
sentences.chinese: 請出示您的護照和入境卡？

sentences.english: Barack Obama says his 86-year-old grandmother has died.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉克奧巴馬錶示他86歲的祖母去世了。

sentences.english: Please show me your passport and your health certificate.
sentences.chinese: 請出示您的護照和健康證。

sentences.english: Please show us your card so we can identify whether it is one of them.
sentences.chinese: 請出示您的信用卡，我們來識別是否屬於白金卡系列。

sentences.english: A slit-like endometrial cavity is surrounded by myometrium at the mid-right.
sentences.chinese: 圖中偏右示裂縫狀的子宮內膜腔，由子宮肌層包繞。
在便雅憫有以拉的兒子示每。

sentences.english: Shimei answered the king, 'What you say is good.
Yan in a low-key source said.
He deign'd not to belie his soul in songs.
sentences.chinese: 他未屈尊吟唱，示靈魂以假象。

sentences.english: And I congratulate him on being the best at what he does.
sentences.chinese: 我對他成爲自己領域裏的頂尖好手錶示祝賀。

sentences.english: Please show me your room card.
Please show me your stability information.
sentences.chinese: 請出示你船白勺穩性資料。

definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row
PET, positron emission tomography (medical imaging method)
pinyin: zheng4 dian4 zi3 fa1 she4 ji4 suan4 ji1 duan4 ceng2
related.word: 正電子發射計算機斷層
